alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:00PM CDT until July 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Southern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near De Soto to near Farmington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Olympian Village around 405 PM CDT. Festus, Crystal City, Herculaneum, and Horine around 410 PM CDT. Pevely around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Valmeyer, Waterloo, New Design, Smithton, New Athens, Belleville, Freeburg and Marissa. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 162 and 180. This also includes Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
